title: Lark Funding special
description: Lark Funding, based in Canada and established June 2022, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $1,000,000. Platforms supported include cTrader, DXTrade, Match Trader, MT4 and MT5. Tradable instruments include over 40 Forex pairs, over 100 crypto derivatives and major US, Australian, LSE and XETRA stocks. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: 000 (calculated 5 PM EST) reset Phase 1 (Challenge) or exclude payout/breach (Funded).
Position & Market Event Restrictions: Close Single Share Equity CFD positions before earnings (3:50 pm ET or day before pre-market).
Drawdown lock (Instant): 8% trailing Max Drawdown resets to initial balance after 8% profit. Withdrawal of all profits results in closure.

payout_policy.processing_time: Instant: On Demand (1st), then 30 days. 1-Step: Bi-weekly. 3-Step: Bi-weekly.
payout_policy.details: Profit Split: Instant 90% default. 1-Step 80% default. 3-Step 80% default.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed between Lark funded accounts or from a Lark funded account to a single Lark evaluation account. Prohibited between multiple evaluation accounts.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Traders must execute at least one trade every 30 days.
firm_rules.news_trading: Not explicitly prohibited in 'News Trading' section, but Position & Market Event Restrictions apply for earnings.
forbidden_strategies: 000 (calculated 5 PM EST) reset Phase 1 (Challenge) or exclude payout/breach (Funded).
Position & Market Event Restrictions: Close Single Share Equity CFD positions before earnings (3:50 pm ET or day before pre-market).
Drawdown lock (Instant): 8% trailing Max Drawdown resets to initial balance after 8% profit. Withdrawal of all profits results in closure.

seo_content:
Lark Funding Technical Infrastructure

Lark Funding, based in Canada and established June 2022, is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, 2 Steps and 3 Steps programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $1,000,000. Platforms supported include cTrader, DXTrade, Match Trader, MT4 and MT5. Tradable instruments include over 40 Forex pairs, over 100 crypto derivatives and major US, Australian, LSE and XETRA stocks. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
